T03D3793:78b-1: aa bhi sa ma ya aa lam k'a ra n'a
T03D3793:78b-2: ma pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta au pa de sha
T03D3793:78b-3: sh'astra brid ti / bod skad du /
T03D3793:78b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag
T03D3793:78b-5: gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya
T03D3793:78b-6: ba'i 'grel pa / bam po dang po /
T03D3793:78b-7: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3793:78b-8: shes rab pha rol phyin pa la //
T03D3793:78b-9: de'i rgyan tshig le'ur byas pa dang /
T03D3793:78b-10: kun gyi rgyan du 'gyur bar ni //
T03D3793:78b-11: rnam par dbye phyir gus phyag 'tshal //
T03D3793:78b-12: 'gro la chags pas kun chags mdzad //
T03D3793:78b-13: 'phags pa thogs med skyob nyid kyis //
T03D3793:78b-14: mi pham mgon la gsan nas ni //
T03D3793:78b-15: bstan bcos chen po'i rnam bshad mdzad //
T03D3793:78b-16: 'gro don rtsa lag dbyig gi gnyen //
T03D3793:78b-17: rang gi mos pa gtsor byed pas //
T03D3793:78b-18: shes bya nang gi yin pa la //
T03D3793:78b-19: yang dag rten nas rnam par bkrol //
T03D3793:78b-20: 'phags pa'i khongs su gtogs pa yi //
T03D3793:78b-21: rnam par grol ba zhes byas kyang //
T03D3793:78b-22: des byas byas pa min mthong nas //
T03D3793:78b-23: dbu mar gnas pa'i blos rnam phye //
T03D3793:78b-24: de yi 'og tu rnam grol sde //
T03D3793:78b-25: dad pa'i sa la gnas pa yis //
T03D3793:78b-26: bstan bcos mtha' dag ma rnyed par //
T03D3793:78b-27: rang dang rjes mthun rnam bshad byas //
T03D3793:78b-28: de ltar mkhas pas snang byas shing //
T03D3793:78b-29: 'ga' zhig kho nas ma rnyed pa'i //
T03D3793:78b-30: bstan bcos mtha' dag 'di de ltar //
T03D3793:78b-31: rnyed pa gang de ya mtshan no //
T03D3793:78b-32: de ltas shin tu rnyed dka' ba //
T03D3793:78b-33: zab mo'i lam 'di ci zhig ltar //
T03D3793:78b-34: sangs rgyas dbang gis rnyed pa ni //
T03D3793:78b-35: mkhas pa rnams kyis dbye ba'i rigs //
T03D3793:78b-36: rnam pa kun du bdag gi ni //
T03D3793:78b-37: spyod yul min yang bsod nams dag / bsgrub dang mthun phyir rang gzhan la //
T03D3793:78b-38: phan gdags 'dod pas spro ba skyes //
T03D3793:78b-39: 'phags pa byams pa rang nyid dam pa'i spyod pa dang mthun par rab tu ston pas /
T03D3793:78b-40: so so rang gi rig pa'i ye shes kyis shes
T03D3793:78b-41: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yul can gyi
T03D3793:78b-42: rab tu dang ba ni legs pa thams cad 'thob
T03D3793:78b-43: pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin no zhes bya bar nges
T03D3793:79a-0: par bzung nas / gzhan dag bcom ldan 'das ma yon tan rin @79a * //
T03D3793:79a-1: po che phul du dbyung du med cing dpag tu
T03D3793:79a-2: med pa'i 'byung gnas la don gyis 'jug par bya
T03D3793:79a-3: ba'i phyir rab tu dang ba bskyed pa'i ched du
T03D3793:79a-4: / re zhig dang por yum la yon tan ji
T03D3793:79a-5: lta ba bzhin du brjod pa sngon du 'gro ba
T03D3793:79a-7: nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang //
T03D3793:79a-8: 'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang //
T03D3793:79a-9: gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsungs pa //
T03D3793:79a-10: nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yum de la phyag 'tshal //
T03D3793:79a-12: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni 'di'i che ba'i bdag
T03D3793:79a-13: nyid phul du byung ba dang ldan pa brjod de
T03D3793:79a-14: / de thos nas re zhig dad pa'i rjes su
T03D3793:79a-15: 'brang ba rnams ni 'di la the tshom med par
T03D3793:79a-16: myur du rab tu dad pa skye'o //
T03D3793:79a-17: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang gcig dang
T03D3793:79a-18: du ma'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir zhes
T03D3793:79a-19: bya ba la sogs pa'i tshad mas gzhi dang lam
T03D3793:79a-20: dang rnam pa skye ba med par yongs su shes
T03D3793:79a-21: pa tshigs su bcad pa'i don gyi mtshan nyid kyi
T03D3793:79a-22: yum la gnod pa ma mthong nas /
T03D3793:79a-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
T03D3793:79a-24: mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid tshul gsum pa
T03D3793:79a-25: can / sangs rgyas la sogs pa bskrun par mdzad
T03D3793:79a-26: pa ni gdon mi za bar srid pa nyid de
T03D3793:79a-28: de la rab tu dang ba skyed par byed pa nyid do //
T03D3793:79a-29: de la rab tu dang bas kyang de'i yon tan
T03D3793:79a-30: mngon par 'dod pa'i gang zag gnyis ka yang de
T03D3793:79a-31: dang de la brten pa'i gsung rab la rnam pa
T03D3793:79a-32: thams cad du gzung ba la sogs pa'i don du
T03D3793:79a-33: shin tu gus par byed do //
T03D3793:79a-34: de nas thos pa las byung ba la sogs pa'i
T03D3793:79a-35: shes pa skye ba'i rim gyis legs pa'i mchog 'thob
T03D3793:79a-36: par 'gyur ro // de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ma la rab tu dang /
T03D3793:79a-37: ba ni legs pa thams cad 'thob pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin no //
T03D3793:79a-38: de la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis ni
T03D3793:79a-39: don brgyad bsdus la de dag kyang shes rab kyi
T03D3793:79a-40: pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhing des kyang 'chad
T03D3793:79a-41: par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis don thams cad phun sum
T03D3793:79b-0: tshogs pa yin no zhes de ltar thugs @79b la
T03D3793:79b-1: bzhag nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi sgo
T03D3793:79b-2: nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3793:79b-3: bstod do // nyan thos dang de'i phyogs su bslan
T03D3793:79b-4: pa rnam par thar pa cung zad tsam zhig gis
T03D3793:79b-5: lhag pa rim pa gcig gis bstan pa rang sangs
T03D3793:79b-6: bstod do // rgyas kyang ste / mya ngan las
T03D3793:79b-7: 'da' bar 'dod pa rnams gzhi thams cad skye ba
T03D3793:79b-8: med par yongs su shes pa nyid kyis phung po
T03D3793:79b-9: dang bcas pa dang phung po med pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3793:79b-10: kyis mya ngan las 'das pa rnam pa gnyis thob
T03D3793:79b-11: par mdzad pa gang yin pa dang /
T03D3793:79b-12: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba ji srid bar 'gro
T03D3793:79b-13: ba'i don byed pa rnams lam thams cad skye ba
T03D3793:79b-14: med par rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'gro ba
T03D3793:79b-15: mtha' dag gi don sgrub par mdzad pa gang yin
T03D3793:79b-16: pa dang / rnam pa thams cad skye ba med par thugs su chud pa gang dang ldan na /
T03D3793:79b-17: sangs rgyas yang dag par bsdams pa'i sku can rnal
T03D3793:79b-18: 'byor can gyi dbang phyug gi gtso bo rnams spyod
T03D3793:79b-19: pa'i gnyen por chos kyi 'khor lo ma lus pa
T03D3793:79b-20: rnam pa thams cad bskor bar mdzad pa /
T03D3793:79b-21: sangs rgyas nyan thos la sogs pas yongs su bskor
T03D3793:79b-22: ba de sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi yul de
T03D3793:79b-24: de ltar phyag 'tshal ba dang bstod pa sngon du
T03D3793:79b-25: 'gro ba'i bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gzhi
T03D3793:79b-26: dang gnyen po dang rnam pa rnams las gang yang
T03D3793:79b-27: rung ba zhig bsdus pa mdzad nas /
T03D3793:79b-28: phyogs dang po ltar na ni 'bad pa don med pa yin te /
T03D3793:79b-29: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
T03D3793:79b-30: ni mtshan nyid kyi bstan bcos dag las mi smos
T03D3793:79b-31: pa'i gzhi gang yin pa de 'byung ba ni med
T03D3793:79b-32: do // gnyis pa ltar na yang rnam par byang
T03D3793:79b-33: ba'i dngos po bsdus pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs
T03D3793:79b-34: pa'i dngos po ma bsdus pas 'di gang gi gnyen
T03D3793:79b-35: po yin pa khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro
T03D3793:79b-36: do // // gsum pa ltar na yang rnam pa
T03D3793:79b-37: gzhi med pa tsam zhig bsdus pa'i phyir don rtogs
T03D3793:79b-38: do // // pa med pas / cung zad kyang
T03D3793:79b-39: ma bshad pa'i phyir don med pa yin no snyam
T03D3793:79b-40: du gzhan dag sems par 'gyur ba ma yin nam
T03D3793:79b-41: do // // pa med pas / zhe na / de ni ma yin te /
T03D3793:79b-42: gang gi phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T03D3793:80a-0: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis go rims ji lta ba bzhin thams cad mkhyen @80a * //
T03D3793:80a-1: pa nyid gsum gyis mngon par rtogs pa mtha' dag
T03D3793:80a-2: bsdus pas na phyogs gsum car gyis kyang bsdus pa'i
T03D3793:80a-3: phyir ro // 'di ltar rgyal ba'i yum bar ma
T03D3793:80a-4: las rab 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid ni nyan
T03D3793:80a-5: thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no //
T03D3793:80a-6: lam shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yin no //
T03D3793:80a-7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin
T03D3793:80a-8: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T03D3793:80a-10: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thams cad 'tshal ba
T03D3793:80a-11: nyid nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi lags
T03D3793:80a-12: / rab 'byor thams cad ni phyi dang nang gi chos rnams ji snyed pa 'di tsam yin la /
T03D3793:80a-13: de dag kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes kyi /
T03D3793:80a-14: lam thams cad kyis kyang ma yin la /
T03D3793:80a-15: rnam pa thams cad du yang ma yin pas de'i
T03D3793:80a-16: phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni
T03D3793:80a-17: thams cad shes pa nyid ces bya'o //
T03D3793:80a-18: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa
T03D3793:80a-19: 'tshal ba nyid byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lags
T03D3793:80a-20: / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni
T03D3793:80a-21: nyan thos kyi lam gang yin pa dang rang sangs
T03D3793:80a-22: rgyas kyi lam gang yin pa dang sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3793:80a-23: lam gang yin pa'i lam thams cad bskyed par bya
T03D3793:80a-24: zhing lam thams cad shes par bya'o //
T03D3793:80a-25: de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par bya zhing de dag gis lam gyi bya ba yang bya la /
T03D3793:80a-26: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma byas pa dang
T03D3793:80a-27: sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas pa
T03D3793:80a-28: dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma sbyangs par
T03D3793:80a-29: de dag gis yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du
T03D3793:80a-30: ni mi bya'o // de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3793:80a-31: rnams kyi ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
T03D3793:80a-32: ni mi bya'o // cas bya'o // bcom ldan 'das
T03D3793:80a-33: ci'i slad du rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3793:80a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
T03D3793:80a-35: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lags /
T03D3793:80a-36: rab 'byor rnam pa gang dag dang rtags gang dag
T03D3793:80a-37: dang mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams rab tu
T03D3793:80a-38: brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang rtags de dag
T03D3793:80a-39: dang mtshan ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pas thugs
T03D3793:80b-0: su chud de de'i phyir de @80b bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3793:80b-1: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T03D3793:80b-2: kyi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces
T03D3793:80b-3: bya'o // de bzhin du mdor bsdus pa las kyang
T03D3793:80b-4: nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang
T03D3793:80b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs la /
T03D3793:80b-6: rgyas pa las kyang rgya cher gsungs so //
T03D3793:80b-7: de la thams cad shes pa nyid ni gzugs la
T03D3793:80b-8: sogs pa'i chos la mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3793:80b-9: rten can 'bras bu bdag tu rmongs pa spangs pa
T03D3793:80b-10: can yin no // lam shes pa nyid ni theg pa thams cad kyis nges par 'byung ba dang /
T03D3793:80b-11: de kho na nyid mngon sum du mi byed pa'i
T03D3793:80b-12: rten can 'bras bu sems can ma bsdus pa sdud
T03D3793:80b-13: pa la sogs par byed pa can yin no //
T03D3793:80b-14: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i rten can /
T03D3793:80b-15: 'bras bu nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs par sems can gyi don rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /
T03D3793:80b-16: yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' rtogs pa dang /
T03D3793:80b-17: bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba nyid spangs pa can yin no //
T03D3793:80b-18: de lta bas na mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ni
T03D3793:80b-19: gzhi dang gnyen po dang rnam pa thams cad bsdus
T03D3793:80b-20: pas mngon par rtogs pa ril rdzogs par bstan pa
T03D3793:80b-21: yin no // zhes bya ba 'di 'thad pa yin no //
T03D3793:80b-22: skye bo blo gros dman pa dag bcom ldan 'das
T03D3793:80b-23: rgyas pa dang 'bring dang mdor bsdus pa la dad
T03D3793:80b-24: pa'i sems can la phan 'dogs par bzhed pa thugs
T03D3793:80b-25: rje can nyid kyis rgyal ba'i yum de dang de
T03D3793:80b-26: las mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi rim pa shes
T03D3793:80b-27: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don mtha' dag
T03D3793:80b-28: gsal bar mdzad pa ma yin nam /
T03D3793:80b-29: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa ma rgyal ba las rgyal
T03D3793:80b-30: bas yang de bstan pa la don ci zhig yod
T03D3793:80b-31: snyam du dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /
T03D3793:80b-32: don la the tshom bskyed pa nyid kyis 'jug pa'i
T03D3793:80b-33: yan lag rang gi bstan bcos kyi brjod par bya
T03D3793:80b-34: ba dang / dgos pa dang dgos pa'i yang dgos
T03D3793:80b-35: pa dang 'brel pa khong na yod pa rnams gsungs
T03D3793:80b-36: ba dang / te / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam //
T03D3793:80b-37: ston pas 'di la bshad pa gang //
T03D3793:80b-38: gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin te //
T03D3793:80b-39: chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi //
T03D3793:80b-40: mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas //
T03D3793:81a-0: @81a * // blo dang ldan pas mthong 'gyur phyir //
T03D3793:81a-1: bde blag tu ni rtogs pa zhes //
T03D3793:81a-2: bya ba rtsom pa'i dgos pa yin //
T03D3793:81a-4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas
T03D3793:81a-5: nyid kyi lam ste mngon par rtogs pa thams cad
T03D3793:81a-6: nye bar mtshon pa lhur len pa yin no //
T03D3793:81a-7: bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'gro
T03D3793:81a-8: ba mtha' dag la rjes su ston par mdzad pa
T03D3793:81a-9: de nyid kyis rgyal ba'i yum rnam pa gsum car
T03D3793:81a-10: las brjod par bya ba nyid du bstan pa gang
T03D3793:81a-11: yin pa / rjod par byed pa dang brjod par
T03D3793:81a-12: bya ba dag thabs dang thabs kyis bsgrub par bya
T03D3793:81a-13: ba'i tshul gyis 'brel par mdzad pa phyi rol pa
T03D3793:81a-14: dang cig shos kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba la
T03D3793:81a-15: sogs pa chos thams cad bdag med pa la goms
T03D3793:81a-16: par ma byas pa rnams kyis thos pa las byung
T03D3793:81a-17: ba la sogs pa'i shes pa skye ba'i rim gyis
T03D3793:81a-19: byang chub sems dpa' rang dang gzhan gyi don du
T03D3793:81a-20: phun sum tshogs pa sgrub pa ci la yang ma
T03D3793:81a-21: rag par chas pa dag kho nas nyams su myong
T03D3793:81a-22: ba shin tu gsal bas bzhag pa'i bag chags las
T03D3793:81a-23: byung ba'i dran pa'i shes pa la /
T03D3793:81a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo'i don
T03D3793:81a-25: ma lus pa mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi bdag
T03D3793:81a-26: nyid byang chub kyi sems dang sbyin pa la sogs
T03D3793:81a-27: pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa legs par bzhag nas /
T03D3793:81a-28: chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba rtogs pa'i mtshan
T03D3793:81a-29: nyid sa rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa rtogs
T03D3793:81a-30: pa'i rim pas rnam pa thams cad mngon sum du
T03D3793:81a-31: byed par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba dgos pa'i yang
T03D3793:81a-32: dgos pa'i yang ched du mngon par 'dod pa'i shes
T03D3793:81a-33: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don byang chub
T03D3793:81a-34: kyi sems dang sgrub pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3793:81a-35: gdul bya rnams kyis bde blag tu rtogs par 'gyur
T03D3793:81a-36: ba ni bstan bcos rtsom pa'i dgos pa yin no
T03D3793:81a-37: // de ltar 'brel pa la sogs pa bsnyad nas /
T03D3793:81a-38: gdul bya rnams kyis bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3793:81a-39: bstan bcos kyi don rnam par dbye ba byas pa
T03D3793:81a-40: yang ma 'dzings pa nyid kyis bshad pa bya sla
T03D3793:81a-41: bar gzigs nas tshig le'ur byas pa bco lngas mdo
T03D3793:81b-0: dang rgyas par bstan pas shes rab kyi @81b pha
T03D3793:81b-1: rol tu phyin pa'i lus rnam par bzhag pa gsungs
T03D3793:81b-2: te / shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni //
T03D3793:81b-3: dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad //
T03D3793:81b-4: rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid //
T03D3793:81b-5: de nas thams cad shes pa nyid //
T03D3793:81b-6: rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa dang //
T03D3793:81b-7: rtse mor phyin dang mthar gyis pa //
T03D3793:81b-8: skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
T03D3793:81b-9: chos kyi sku dang de rnam brgyad //
T03D3793:81b-10: sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang //
T03D3793:81b-11: nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang //
T03D3793:81b-12: sgrub pa yi ni rten gyur pa //
T03D3793:81b-13: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang //
T03D3793:81b-14: dmigs pa dag dang ched dang ni //
T03D3793:81b-15: go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang //
T03D3793:81b-16: tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams //
T03D3793:81b-17: thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid //
T03D3793:81b-18: mog mog por byed la sogs dang //
T03D3793:81b-19: slob ma bse ru'i lam gang dang //
T03D3793:81b-20: 'di dang gzhan pa'i yon tan gyis //
T03D3793:81b-21: phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam //
T03D3793:81b-22: byed pa dang ni mos pa dang //

T03D3793:105b-19: rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
T03D3793:105b-21: chags pa med pa'i rnam pa dag ni /
T03D3793:105b-22: go rims bzhin du sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed pa'i lam dang /
T03D3793:105b-23: ji ltar sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed pa dang /
T03D3793:105b-24: rigs pa gang yin pa dang /
T03D3793:105b-25: ji ltar rigs pa yin pa dang /
T03D3793:105b-26: sgrub pa gang yin pa dang /
T03D3793:105b-27: ji ltar sgrub pa yin pa dang /
T03D3793:105b-28: nges par 'byin pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid /
T03D3793:105b-31: de ltar na lam gyi bden pa'i rnam pa bdun yin no //
T03D3793:105b-34: stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /
T03D3793:105b-35: lnga pa mtshan nyid med pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams te /
T03D3793:105b-36: de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i rnam pa lnga yin no //
T03D3793:105b-37: 'gog pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid ni nang dang phyi dang gnyis ka'i dngos po rnams dgag pas /
T03D3793:105b-38: nang dang phyi dang gnyis ka stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa ste gsum dang /
T03D3793:105b-39: zhi ba'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid btags pa'i bdag stong pa dang /
T03D3793:105b-44: rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' dang /
T03D3793:105b-45: 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang /
T03D3793:105b-46: rtogs pa'i chos dor ba med pa la mngon par zhen pa dgag pas /
T03D3793:105b-53: thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang /
T03D3793:105b-54: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa ste brgyad dang /
T03D3793:106a-1: rnam pa gzhan gyis kun brtags pa'i byed pa po dgag pas /
T03D3793:106a-2: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /
T03D3793:106a-3: nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa yul du 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid brtags pa dang /
T03D3793:106a-5: dus su 'khrul pa rnams dgag pas /
T03D3793:106a-8: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa ste
T03D3793:106a-9: gsum dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa kho na
T03D3793:106a-10: ngo bo nyid dgag pas dngos po med pa'i ngo
T03D3793:106a-11: bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa gcig ste
T03D3793:106a-12: / de ltar na 'gog pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa ni bcu drug yin la /
T03D3793:106a-13: spyir na lam shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug yin no //
T03D3793:106a-14: de'i 'og tu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa /
T03D3793:106a-15: dran pa nyer gzhag nas bzung ste //
T03D3793:106a-16: sangs rgyas rnam pa'i mthar thug rnams //
T03D3793:106a-17: lam gyi bden pa'i rjes mthun par //
T03D3793:106a-18: kun mkhyen gsum du phye bas na //
T03D3793:106a-19: slob ma byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T03D3793:106a-20: sangs rgyas rnams la rim bzhin de //
T03D3793:106a-21: sum cu bdun dang sum cu bzhi //
T03D3793:106a-22: sum cu rtsa dgu dag tu bzhed //
T03D3793:106a-24: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas bzung ste /
T03D3793:106a-25: sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa'i mthar thug pa rnams ni
T03D3793:106a-26: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis bsdus pa'i lam
T03D3793:106a-28: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir /
T03D3793:106a-29: grangs bzhin du nyan thos rnams la rnam pa sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
T03D3793:106a-30: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sum cu rtsa bzhi dang /
T03D3793:106a-31: sangs rgyas rnams la sum cu rtsa dgur bzhed do zhes bya ba yin no //
T03D3793:106a-32: de la thams cad shes pa nyid la dang por dngos po la yongs su rtog pa'i lam la /
T03D3793:106a-33: bden pa bzhi la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3793:106a-37: chos rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis yongs su brtags
T03D3793:106a-38: pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rnam pa bzhi'o
T03D3793:106a-39: de'i 'og tu zhugs pa la brtson 'grus 'byung bas
T03D3793:106a-40: rtsol ba las byung ba'i lam la mi dge ba
T03D3793:106a-41: dang dge ba skyes pa dang ma skyes pa dag
T03D3793:106a-42: go rims bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang
T03D3793:106b-2: bskyed pa'i rgyu'i brtson 'grus yang dag par spong ba'i rnam pa bzhi'o //
T03D3793:106b-3: brtson 'grus dang ldan pa ni sems las su rung ba nyid du byed pas /
T03D3793:106b-4: ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyong ba'i lam la /
T03D3793:106b-8: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang
T03D3793:106b-9: ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rnam pa bzhi'o
T03D3793:106b-10: // sems yongs su sbyang ba byas pa la dro
T03D3793:106b-11: ba dang rtse mo'i sbyor ba 'byung bas mngon par
T03D3793:106b-12: rtogs par sbyor ba'i lam la dro ba dang rtse
T03D3793:106b-18: shes rab kyi dbang po'i rnam pa lnga'o //
T03D3793:106b-19: dro ba la sogs pa thob pa la bzod pa
T03D3793:106b-20: dang chos kyi mchog 'byung bas mngon par rtogs pa
T03D3793:106b-21: dang 'brel pa'i lam la bzod pa dang chos mchog
T03D3793:106b-27: shes rab kyi stobs kyi rnam pa lnga'o //
T03D3793:106b-28: dro ba la sogs pa bzhi rtogs pa la bden pa mthong ba'i lam 'byung bas /
T03D3793:106b-29: mngon par rtogs pa'i lam la dran pa dang /
T03D3793:106b-30: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang /
T03D3793:106b-35: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pa bdun no //
T03D3793:106b-36: bden pa mthong ba yongs su shes pa la bsgom pa'i lam 'byung bas /
T03D3793:106b-37: rnam par dag par nges par 'byin pa'i lam la yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
T03D3793:106b-44: ting nge 'dzin 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi rnam pa brgyad de /
T03D3793:106b-45: de ltar na slob ma rnams la kun shes pa
T03D3793:106b-46: nyid kyi lam gyi rten can gyi rnam pa sum
T03D3793:106b-48: lam shes pa nyid la gnyen po'i lam //
T03D3793:106b-49: lta bas byas pa'i gnyen po dang //
T03D3793:106b-50: de'i rgyu mtshan gyi rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po dang /
T03D3793:106b-51: khams gsum pa la smon pa'i gnyen po zhes bya
T03D3793:106b-52: ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid la go rims
T03D3793:107a-0: bdag med pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i @107a * //
T03D3793:107a-3: lam gyi bden pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gnyis pa'o //
T03D3793:107a-6: kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gsum pa ste /
T03D3793:107a-7: de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi rnam pa gsum mo //
T03D3793:107a-9: gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par ma bshig pa dang rnam par bshig pa'i phyir /
T03D3793:107a-10: go rims bzhin du nang gzugs can dang gzugs can
T03D3793:107a-11: ma yin pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta'o
T03D3793:107a-12: zhes bya ba sprul pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por rnam
T03D3793:107a-14: gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa sprul pa la
T03D3793:107a-15: go rims bzhin du dga' ba dang mi dga' ba'i
T03D3793:107a-16: kun nas nyon mongs pa de dag gi gnyen por
T03D3793:107a-17: sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo lus kyis mngon
T03D3793:107a-18: sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te /
T03D3793:107a-19: gnas so zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa gcig
T03D3793:107a-20: ste de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnam
T03D3793:107a-21: pa gsum mo // mthong ba'i chos la bde bar
T03D3793:107a-22: gnas pa'i lam la thar pa dang mthun par gnas
T03D3793:107a-23: pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin la gzugs med pa'i snyoms
T03D3793:107a-24: par 'jug pa'i rnam pa bzhi dang zhi bar gnas
T03D3793:107a-25: pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin la 'du shes dang tshor
T03D3793:107a-26: ba 'gog pa'i rnam pa gcig ste de ltar na
T03D3793:107a-27: pa gsum mo // rnam pa lnga'o // 'jig rten
T03D3793:107a-28: las 'das pa'i lam la bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs
T03D3793:107a-29: med pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag
T03D3793:107a-30: pa gsum mo // rnam pa lnga'o // ste dgu'o
T03D3793:107a-31: // spong ba'i lam la bar chad med pa'i lam
T03D3793:107a-32: gyi rnam pa bden pa bzhis bsdus pa nyon mongs
T03D3793:107a-33: pa dang mi ldan pa'i mtshan nyid bzhi'o //
T03D3793:107a-34: sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam la /
T03D3793:107a-35: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa bcu ste /
T03D3793:107a-36: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lam
T03D3793:107a-37: shes pa nyid kyi lam gyi rten can gyi rnam
T03D3793:107a-39: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa
T03D3793:107a-40: ni shin tu phul du byung ba'i phyir thun mong
T03D3793:107a-41: ma yin pa'i lam gcig pu kho na yin te
T03D3793:107a-42: / de la ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang /
T03D3793:107a-43: las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /
T03D3793:107b-0: 'jig rten @107b gyi khams du ma dang /
T03D3793:107b-1: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa dang /
T03D3793:107b-2: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam dang /
T03D3793:107b-3: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3793:107b-5: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T03D3793:107b-8: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi rnam pa bcu dang ;
T03D3793:107b-9: nga ni sangs rgyas so zhes bdag nyid zhal gyis 'ches pa dang /
T03D3793:107b-10: 'dod chags la sogs pa bar chad byed pa nyid du brjod pa dang /
T03D3793:107b-11: thams cad shes pa nyid la sogs pa'i lam nges
T03D3793:107b-12: par 'byung ba nyid du rab tu bstan pa dang
T03D3793:107b-13: / bdag nyid kyi zag pa zad pa nyid du
T03D3793:107b-14: zhal gyis bzhes pa la rgol ba po med pas
T03D3793:107b-15: mi 'jigs pa'i rnam pa bzhi dang /
T03D3793:107b-19: chos rab tu dbye ba'i yul la go rims bzhin du chos dang /
T03D3793:107b-22: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
T03D3793:107b-26: thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /
T03D3793:107b-27: tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes dang /
T03D3793:107b-28: so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga' ba'i rnam pa drug dang /
T03D3793:107b-34: rnam par grol ba las nyams pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam pa drug dang /
T03D3793:107b-35: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las rnams ye
T03D3793:107b-36: shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su
T03D3793:107b-41: ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa gsum ste /
T03D3793:107b-42: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa dag dang /
T03D3793:107b-43: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
T03D3793:107b-44: chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur pa'i rang 'byung dang ;
T03D3793:107b-45: rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam pa gsum ste /
T03D3793:107b-46: de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams
T03D3793:107b-47: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi rten can gyi
T03D3793:107b-48: rnam pa ni sum cu rtsa dgu'o //
T03D3793:108a-0: de la thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa ni nyan @108a * //
T03D3793:108a-1: thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i bye brag gis /
T03D3793:108a-2: go rims bzhin du zag pa med pa dang /
T03D3793:108a-3: zag pa dang bcas pa dag kyang yin no //
T03D3793:108a-4: lam shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa ni byang chub
T03D3793:108a-5: sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa shin tu ma
T03D3793:108a-6: spangs pa'i phyir zag pa dang bcas pa kho na
T03D3793:108a-7: yin no // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3793:108a-8: kyi lam gyi rnam pa ni yang dag par rdzogs
T03D3793:108a-9: pa'i sangs rgyas kyis nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i
T03D3793:108a-10: sgrib pa'i bag chags dang bcas te rnam pa thams
T03D3793:108a-11: cad du spangs pas chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur
T03D3793:108a-12: ba'i phyir zag pa med pa kho na dag yin
T03D3793:108a-13: yin no // te / rnam pa rnams gcig tu
T03D3793:108a-14: bsdoms na rnam pa brgya bdun cu rtsa gsum yod
T03D3793:108a-15: yin no // te / do // sbyor ba khyad
T03D3793:108a-16: par can dag gis rnam pa rnams bsgom dgos na
T03D3793:108a-17: de dag kyang sbyor ba po med par brjod par
T03D3793:108a-18: mi nus pas mnyan pa la sogs pa'i snod sbyor
T03D3793:108a-19: yin no // te / do // ba bo // sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par byas //
T03D3793:108a-20: de la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun //
T03D3793:108a-21: dge ba'i bshes kyi mgon bcas pa //
T03D3793:108a-22: 'di mnyan pa yi snod yin no //
T03D3793:108a-23: sangs rgyas bsten dang kun 'dri dang //
T03D3793:108a-24: sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs spyod pas //
T03D3793:108a-25: len dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i //
T03D3793:108a-26: snod du dam pa rnams bzhed do //
T03D3793:108a-28: 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams
T03D3793:108a-29: la spyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun cing sbyangs pa
T03D3793:108a-30: dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la lus la
T03D3793:108a-31: sogs pa'i bsnyen bkur gyis mnyes par bya ba dang
T03D3793:108a-32: dang / / the tshom gyi don yongs su 'dri ba dang /
T03D3793:108a-33: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu sgrub pa dang ldan pa dang /
T03D3793:108a-34: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams ni /
T03D3793:108a-35: go rims ji lta bar rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi yum 'di'i gzhung mnyan pa dang /
T03D3793:108a-38: tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i snod nyid yin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa bzhed do //
T03D3793:108a-39: de ltar sbyor ba po bstan nas sbyor ba /
T03D3793:108a-40: gzugs la sogs la mi gnas phyir //
T03D3793:108a-41: de la sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir //
T03D3793:108a-42: de yi de bzhin nyid zab phyir //
T03D3793:108b-0: de rnams gting dpag dka' @108b ba'i phyir //
T03D3793:108b-1: de dag tshad ni med phyir dang //
T03D3793:108b-2: tshigs chen yun rings rtogs pa'i phyir //
T03D3793:108b-3: lung bstan phyir mi ldog nyid dang //
T03D3793:108b-4: nges 'byung bar chad med bcas dang //
T03D3793:108b-5: byang chub nye dang myur ba dang //
T03D3793:108b-7: chos dang chos min sogs mi mthong //
T03D3793:108b-8: gzugs sogs bsam mi khyab mi mthong //
T03D3793:108b-9: gzugs sogs de yi mtshan ma dang //
T03D3793:108b-10: de yi ngo bo rnam mi rtog /'bras bu rin chen sbyin byed dang //
T03D3793:108b-11: de ni dag pa mtshams dang bcas //
T03D3793:108b-13: gzugs la sogs pa la ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis mi gnas pa dang /
T03D3793:108b-14: de dag la mi sbyor ba nyid sbyor ba yin pa dang /
T03D3793:108b-15: gzugs la sogs pa de dag nyid de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis zab pa dang /
T03D3793:108b-17: tshad med pa zhes bya ba de ltar rtogs pa
T03D3793:108b-18: rnams kyi grangs bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa la
T03D3793:108b-23: tshad med pa'i sbyor ba ste lnga dang /
T03D3793:108b-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skrag pa dang mi skrag pa dang /
T03D3793:108b-26: bar chad kyi chos spong ba dang /
T03D3793:108b-27: rtag tu chos sgom pa dang /
T03D3793:108b-28: zag pa med pa'i chos gsar gyi rten nyid dang /
T03D3793:108b-29: 'bras bu chos kyi sku mngon par 'grub pa dang /
T03D3793:108b-30: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /
T03D3793:108b-31: 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mi mthong ba dang /
T03D3793:108b-32: 'dod pa'i khams su mi dmigs pa dang /
T03D3793:108b-33: gzugs la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par rlom pa med pa dang /
T03D3793:108b-36: de'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
T03D3793:108b-37: 'bras bu dang po mthong ba dang /
T03D3793:108b-38: gzugs rnam par dag pa dang /
T03D3793:108b-39: lo skor du mngon par brtson pa mi 'dor ba
T03D3793:108b-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgrub pa dang ldan
T03D3793:108b-41: pa rnams kyi go rims bzhin du /
T03D3793:108b-42: tshigs chen pos yun ring po zhig nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
T03D3793:108b-44: phyir mi ldog pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:109a-0: yang dag par mngon par rdzogs @109a * //
T03D3793:109a-1: pa'i byang chub la nye ba dang /
T03D3793:109a-2: myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-6: chos dang chos ma yin pa la sogs par mi dmigs pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-7: gzugs la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam pa 'gog pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-8: gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos por rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-9: 'bras bu rin po che sbyin pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-11: sa mtshams la sbyor ba dang rnam pa bco lnga ste sbyor ba nyi shu yin no //
T03D3793:109a-12: yon tan mthong ba sngon du btang na sbyor ba
T03D3793:109a-13: rnams la shin tu goms par byed pas sbyor ba'i
T03D3793:109a-14: 'og tu de dag gi yon tan /
T03D3793:109a-15: bdud kyi mthu bcom la sogs pa //
T03D3793:109a-16: yon tan rnam pa bcu bzhi'o //
T03D3793:109a-18: bdud kyi mthu bcom pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-19: sangs rgyas kyis dgongs shing mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:109a-20: sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du mdzad pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-21: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-22: don chen po nyid la sogs pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-24: zag pa med pa'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-25: smra ba'i skyes bu nyid dang /
T03D3793:109a-27: dge ba'i rtsa ba thun mong ma yin pa skye ba dang /
T03D3793:109a-28: dam bcas pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-29: 'bras bu rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-30: sems can gyi don sgrub pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-31: nges par 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i yon tan rnams te /
T03D3793:109a-32: grangs bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-33: dgongs pa dang ye shes kyis gzigs pa dang /
T03D3793:109a-37: gnyen po'i chos yongs su rdzogs pa dang /

T03D3793:132b-0: @132b pha rol gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i nyon mongs
T03D3793:132b-1: pa'i dgra'i rgyun drungs 'byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes
T03D3793:132b-2: bya ba gang yin pa nyon mongs pa med pa

T03D3793:132b-6: pa dang rnam par grol ba ji srid pa'i gnas
T03D3793:132b-7: skabs su 'jug pa zhes bya ba smon nas mkhyen
T03D3793:132b-8: dang / pa dang / sngar bshad pa'i mngon par shes pa drug dang /

T03D3793:132b-10: rten dang dmigs pa dang thugs dang ye shes yongs
T03D3793:132b-11: su dag pa zhes bya ba dag pa bzhi dang

T03D3793:132b-25: 'di la phyin ci log gi kun du spyod pa
T03D3793:132b-26: gzhan gyis yongs su shes pa'i bsnyengs pas bcab par

T03D3793:133a-1: chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa la sogs pa spros

T03D3793:133a-6: thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni //

T03D3793:133a-10: las 'das pa'i zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kho
T03D3793:133a-11: na khas blangs nas ngo bo nyid kyi sku ni

T03D3793:133a-13: gang yin pa de'i mtshan nyid can yin te /
T03D3793:133a-14: de nyid kyang chos nyid kyi sku yin pa las
T03D3793:133a-15: chos kyi sku'o zhes ngo bo'i rkyen mi mngon par
T03D3793:133a-16: byas nas bstan to zhes rnam par bshad nas /
T03D3793:133a-17: chos kyi sku gang dag gi rang bzhin gyi mtshan
T03D3793:133a-18: nyid can yin pa'i zag pa med pa'i chos de
T03D3793:133a-19: dag kyang gang dag cig yin zhe na ;
T03D3793:133a-20: byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang //
T03D3793:133a-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa la 'jug par byed do //
T03D3793:133a-22: gzhan dag na re de dag gi ltar na rnal
T03D3793:133a-23: 'byor pa'i kun rdzob tu don khyad par can snang
T03D3793:133a-25: gnas yongs su gyur pas gyur pa /
T03D3793:133a-26: chos ston pa la sogs pa'i don gyi bya ba
T03D3793:133a-27: mdzad pa gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las
T03D3793:133a-28: byung ba gdon mi za bar khas blang dgos pa
T03D3793:133a-29: rnams ji ltar bsdu zhes zer ro //
T03D3793:133a-31: ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang //
T03D3793:133a-32: de bzhin gzhan pa sprul pa ni //
T03D3793:133a-33: chos sku mdzad par bcas pa ste //
T03D3793:133a-34: rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod //
T03D3793:133a-35: ces bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa las /
T03D3793:133a-36: ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i sgra'i mjug thogs su
T03D3793:133a-37: chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i sgra mi 'byung bas
T03D3793:133a-38: sku ni gsum kho na'o zhes zer ro //
T03D3793:133a-39: gzhan dag na re dgos pa nye bar bstan pa'i shugs kyis tshig le'ur byas pa sbyar ba'i ngor /
T03D3793:133a-40: ye shes kho na dang mdzad pa sbyar ba'i phyir de skad du gsungs pa yin te /
T03D3793:133a-41: de'i phyir phyogs gzhan nas sku bzhir gsungs pa thams cad mi 'gal bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T03D3793:133a-42: nyan thos la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i
T03D3793:133b-0: ting nge 'dzin las sangs @133b rgyas kyi nyon mongs
T03D3793:133b-1: pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin khyad par du bya
T03D3793:133b-2: ba'i phyir bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
T03D3793:133b-3: nyan thos nyon mongs med pa'i lta //
T03D3793:133b-4: mi yi nyon mongs yongs spong nyid //
T03D3793:133b-5: grong sogs su de'i nyon mongs rnams //
T03D3793:133b-6: rgyun gcod rgyal ba'i nyon mongs med //
T03D3793:133b-8: nyan thos la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
T03D3793:133b-9: bdag mthong ba las 'ga' zhig gi nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur na mi rung ngo zhes /
T03D3793:133b-10: mi'i nyon mongs pa skye ba yongs su spong ba nyid yin no //
T03D3793:133b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
T03D3793:133b-12: grong la sogs par skye bo mtha' dag gi nyon
T03D3793:133b-13: mongs pa'i rgyun drungs 'byin par mdzad pa yin no
T03D3793:133b-14: // nyan thos la sogs pa'i smon nas shes pa bas /
T03D3793:133b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon nas mkhyen pa khyad par
T03D3793:133b-16: du bstan pa'i phyir bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad
T03D3793:133b-17: pa / sangs rgyas smon nas mkhyen pa ni //
T03D3793:133b-18: lhun gyis grub dang chags spangs dang //
T03D3793:133b-19: thogs pa med dang rtag gnas dang //
T03D3793:133b-20: dri ba kun lan 'debs par bzhed //
T03D3793:133b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon nas mkhyen pa ni /
T03D3793:133b-23: mtshan ma med pa nyid du rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa dang /
T03D3793:133b-24: dngos po la mngon par ma zhen pas /
T03D3793:133b-25: gzugs la sogs pa la chags pa dang bral ba dang /
T03D3793:133b-26: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags
T03D3793:133b-27: dang bcas te spangs pas shes bya thams cad la
T03D3793:133b-29: 'khor ba ji srid par gnas pa'i phyir rtag tu gnas pa dang /
T03D3793:133b-30: yang dag pa'i so sor rig pa brnyes pas 'dri
T03D3793:133b-31: ba'i lan 'debs par mdzad pa yin par bzhed do
T03D3793:133b-32: // nyan thos la sogs pa yi ni bzlog pa nyid kyis de lta ma yin no //
T03D3793:133b-33: rtag tu thugs rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi skul bzhugs na yang /
T03D3793:133b-34: rtag tu ji ltar don mi mdzad //
T03D3793:133b-35: ces bya ba'i lan gdab pa'i phyir /
T03D3793:133b-36: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
T03D3793:133b-37: rgyu ni yongs su smin gyur nas //
T03D3793:133b-38: gang dang gang la gang dang ni //
T03D3793:133b-39: gang tshe bya ba phan gyur pa //
T03D3793:133b-40: de dang de la de snang ngo //
T03D3793:134a-1: sogs pa dang phrad pas sngon bskyed pa'i dge ba'i
T03D3793:134a-2: rtsa ba'i sa bon sangs rgyas la sogs pa la
T03D3793:134a-3: dmigs pa'i rgyu yongs su brtas par gyur nas sems
T03D3793:134a-4: can gang la gang gi dus su chos bstan pa
T03D3793:134a-6: yun du 'phrod par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T03D3793:134a-7: de'i don bya ba'i phyir sngon gyi smon lam grub pas /
T03D3793:134a-8: bcom ldan 'das de dang der snang ba dang 'tsham
T03D3793:134a-9: par don gyi bya ba mdzad pas dus thams cad
T03D3793:134a-10: du yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar nye bar gnas
T03D3793:134a-11: kyang / rang gi las kyi nyes pas bskyed pa la rgyu ma tshang bas /
T03D3793:134a-12: 'bras bu smin par mdzad par mi snang ngo snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
T03D3793:134a-13: de ji lta bu zhig snyam pa la bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pas dpe /
T03D3793:134a-14: lha yi rgyal pos char phab kyang //
T03D3793:134a-15: sa bon mi rung mi 'khrung ltar //
T03D3793:134a-16: sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur kyang //
T03D3793:134a-17: skal ba med pas bzang mi myong //
T03D3793:134a-19: dper na lha'i dbang pos char phab tu zin kyang
T03D3793:134a-20: til la sogs pa'i sa bon rul ba'i ngo bo
T03D3793:134a-21: la sogs pa sa bon mi rung bar gyur pa
T03D3793:134a-22: mi 'khrung pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas yid la
T03D3793:134a-23: re ba mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par mkhas pa
T03D3793:134a-24: rnams byung yang skal pa med pas dam pa'i chos
T03D3793:134a-25: mnyan pa la sogs pa'i bzang po thob par mi
T03D3793:134a-26: 'gyur ro // ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyi chos
T03D3793:134a-27: kyi sku rnal 'byor pa so sor nges pa'i rgyud
T03D3793:134a-28: kyi rten la yod pa skad cig re re la
T03D3793:134a-29: 'byung ba ji ltar khyab pa dang /
T03D3793:134a-30: rtag pa zhes kyang brjod ce na /
T03D3793:134a-31: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa /
T03D3793:134a-32: de ltar mdzad pa rgya che'i phyir //
T03D3793:134a-33: sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod //
T03D3793:134a-34: de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir //
T03D3793:134a-35: rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin //
T03D3793:134a-37: de ltar ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis thams cad
T03D3793:134a-38: du snang ba'i sgo nas bya ba mdzad pa rgya
T03D3793:134a-40: rgyun chags su 'khor ba ji srid par bzhugs kyang
T03D3793:134a-41: bcom ldan 'das la zad pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir
T03D3793:134a-42: go rims bzhin du sangs rgyas khyab pa dang /
T03D3793:134a-43: rtag pa zhes mngon par brjod do //
T03D3793:134a-44: de ltar sku gnyis bstan nas /
T03D3793:134b-0: gsum pa longs @134b spyod rdzogs pa'i sku gzugs kyi
T03D3793:134b-1: sku'i ngo bo nyid mtshan dang dpe phyad bzang pos
T03D3793:134b-2: 'bar ba / mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T03D3793:134b-3: dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di //
T03D3793:134b-4: theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
T03D3793:134b-5: thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed //
T03D3793:134b-7: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T03D3793:134b-8: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i ngo bo nyid 'di
T03D3793:134b-9: ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la
T03D3793:134b-11: thabs cig tu theg pa chen po'i chos kyi longs
T03D3793:134b-12: spyod kyi dga' ba dang bde ba shin tu kha
T03D3793:134b-13: na ma tho ba med pa nye bar spyod pa'i
T03D3793:134b-14: phyir / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin no //
T03D3793:134b-15: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gang dag cig yin zhe na /
T03D3793:134b-16: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa lnga ni /
T03D3793:134b-17: phyag zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs //
T03D3793:134b-18: phyag dang zhabs sor dra bas 'brel pa dang //
T03D3793:134b-19: phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags //
T03D3793:134b-20: 'di yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang //
T03D3793:134b-21: sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang //
T03D3793:134b-22: zhabs 'bur mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs //
T03D3793:134b-23: byin pa ae na ya'i 'dra phyag ring mdzes //
T03D3793:134b-24: 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog / pags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang //
T03D3793:134b-25: spu ni re re nas g-yas legs 'khrungs dang //
T03D3793:134b-26: zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stod seng ge'i 'dra //
T03D3793:134b-27: 'di yi dpung pa'i mgo zlum thal gong rgyas //
T03D3793:134b-28: 'di la ro mi zhim pa ro mchog snang //
T03D3793:134b-29: sku ni n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab //
T03D3793:134b-30: gtsug tor dbur ldan ljags ring mdzes pa dang //
T03D3793:134b-31: tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra dang tshems //
T03D3793:134b-32: shin tu dkar dang tshad mnyam thags bzang dang //
T03D3793:134b-33: grangs ni bzhi bcu tham pa tshang ba dang //
T03D3793:134b-34: spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi //
T03D3793:134b-35: 'dra ba 'di dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
T03D3793:134b-37: bla ma rnams la skyel ba dang bsu ba la
T03D3793:134b-38: sogs pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan
T03D3793:134b-39: pa nyid dang / sdom pa yang dag bar blangs
T03D3793:134b-40: pa la brtan pa nyid kyis rus sbal bzhin du
T03D3793:134b-41: zhabs shin tu gnas pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-1: po bzhi bstan pas phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo
T03D3793:135a-2: ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bur dra bar 'brel pa
T03D3793:135a-3: nyid dang / bza' ba dang dang bca' ba la
T03D3793:135a-4: sogs pa kya nom pa byin pas phyag dang zhabs
T03D3793:135a-5: 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-6: bldag pa la sogs pa shin tu gya nom pa byin pas phyag dang zhabs dang thal gong dang /
T03D3793:135a-7: ltag pa'i phyogs mtho ba'i phyir bdun mtho ba nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-8: gsad par bya ba las thar bar byas pas sor mo ring ba nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-9: 'tsho nga la phan btags pa nyid kyis rting pa yangs pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-10: srog gcod pa spangs pa nyid kyis sku che zhing drang ba nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-11: dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pas zhabs long bu mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-12: dge ba yang dag par blangs pa spel bas sku'i sdu gyen du phyogs pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-13: rig pa dang bzo la sogs pa gus par byas
T03D3793:135a-14: te byin pas byin pa ri dags ae na ya'i
T03D3793:135a-15: lta bu dang / nor bdog pa la slong ba
T03D3793:135a-16: po'i skye bo phyir ma spangs pas phyag ring zhing
T03D3793:135a-18: skye bo thams cad tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par len du 'jug pa dang /
T03D3793:135a-19: gsang ba'i gsang tshig bsrungs pas 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-20: gding ba gya nom pa byin pas mdog gser 'dra ba nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-21: khang bzang la sogs pa dam pa byin pas pags pa 'jam pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-22: 'du 'dzi la sogs pa yongs su spangs pas spu
T03D3793:135a-23: re re nas g-yas phyogs su 'khyil ba nyid dang
T03D3793:135a-24: / skye bo bla ma thams cad gnas ji lta
T03D3793:135a-25: ba bzhin du bkod pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa
T03D3793:135a-26: / nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad du kha
T03D3793:135a-27: drag gi tshig gis khyad du ma bsad pas ro
T03D3793:135a-28: stod seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-29: snyan par smra ba dang legs par smra ba'i rjes
T03D3793:135a-30: su mthun par byas pas dpung mgo shin tu zlum
T03D3793:135a-31: pa nyid dang / sman la sogs pa byin pas thal gong rgyas pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-32: skye bo nad pa'i g-yog byas pas ro bro ba'i mchog mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:135a-33: nags tshal dang kun dga' ra ba la sogs pa
T03D3793:135a-34: byed pa yang dag par len du bcug pas shing
T03D3793:135a-35: n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang
T03D3793:135a-36: / gtsug lag khang la sogs pa lhag par byin pas dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:135b-0: 'jam po la @135b sogs pa gsung bas ljags ring ba nyid dang /
T03D3793:135b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can la
T03D3793:135b-2: dam pa'i chos go bar byas pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs
T03D3793:135b-3: nyid dang / tshig kyal pa spangs pas 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba nyid dang /
T03D3793:135b-4: skye bo thams cad bkur ba la sogs pas tshems dkar ba nyid dang /
T03D3793:135b-5: 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa nyid kyis tshems mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03D3793:135b-6: bden pa'i tshig kun du spyad pas tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang /
T03D3793:135b-7: phra ma'i tshig spangs pas tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba nyid dang /
T03D3793:135b-8: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar bltas pas spyan mthon mthing nyid dang /
T03D3793:135b-9: khong khro ba la sogs pa med par bltas pas rdzi ma ba'i lta bu nyid do //
T03D3793:135b-10: rgyu grub pas mtshan 'grub bo zhes bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
T03D3793:135b-11: 'di la mtshan ni gang gang gi / sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin //
T03D3793:135b-12: de dang de ni rab rdzogs pas //
T03D3793:135b-15: mtshan gang gis sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin
T03D3793:135b-16: pa de rab tu rdzogs pas mtshan sum cu rtsa
T03D3793:135b-18: rgyu de gang yin zhe na /
T03D3793:135b-19: de'i 'og tu bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag gis /
T03D3793:135b-20: bla ma skyel la sogs pa dang //
T03D3793:135b-21: yang dag blangs pa brtan pa dang //
T03D3793:135b-22: bsdu ba bsten dang gya nom pa'i //
T03D3793:135b-23: dngos po sbyin dang gsad bya ba //
T03D3793:135b-24: thar bar byed dang dge ba ni //
T03D3793:135b-25: yang dag blangs pa spel la sogs //
T03D3793:135b-26: sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid de //
T03D3793:135b-27: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin //
T03D3793:135b-29: tshig le'ur byas pa 'di gnyis ni /
T03D3793:135b-30: gong nyid du mtshan bshad par bkrol zin pas yang mi bri'o //
T03D3793:135b-31: de ltar mtshan rnams brjod nas bar skabs kyi tshigs
T03D3793:135b-32: su bcad pa bcu gnyis kyis dpe byad bzang po
T03D3793:135b-33: gsungs pa / thub pa'i sen mo zang mdog dang //
T03D3793:135b-34: mdog snum mtho dang sor mo rnams //
T03D3793:135b-35: zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang //
T03D3793:135b-36: rtsa mi mngon dang mdud pa med //
T03D3793:135b-37: long bu mi mngon zhabs mnyam dang //
T03D3793:135b-38: seng ge glang chen bya dang ni //
T03D3793:135b-39: khyu mchog stabs gshegs g-yas phyogs dang //
T03D3793:135b-40: mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags //
T03D3793:136a-2: mtshan ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-3: sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang //
T03D3793:136a-4: gom snyoms pa dang spyan gnyis ni //
T03D3793:136a-5: dag dang gzhon sha can nyid dang //
T03D3793:136a-6: sku zhum med dang rgyas pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-7: shin tu grims pa'i sku nyid dang //
T03D3793:136a-8: yan lag shin tu rnam 'byes dang //
T03D3793:136a-9: gzigs pa sgrib med dag pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-10: dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang //
T03D3793:136a-11: phyang nge ba dang lte ba ni //
T03D3793:136a-12: zab dang g-yas phyogs 'khyil ba dang //
T03D3793:136a-13: kun nas blta na sdug pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-14: kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni //
T03D3793:136a-15: sme ba gnag bag med pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-16: phyag ni shing bal ltar 'jam dang //
T03D3793:136a-17: phyag ris mdangs yod zab ring dang //
T03D3793:136a-18: zhal ni ha cang mi ring dang //
T03D3793:136a-19: mchu ni bim pa ltar dmar dang //
T03D3793:136a-20: ljags mnyen pa dang srab pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-21: dmar dang 'brug gi sgra nyid dang //
T03D3793:136a-22: gsung mnyen 'jam dang mche ba zlum //
T03D3793:136a-23: rno dang dkar dang mnyam pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-24: byin gyis phra dang shangs mtho dang //
T03D3793:136a-25: mchog tu dag pa dag dang ni //
T03D3793:136a-26: spyan yangs pa dang rdzi ma stug / padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang //
T03D3793:136a-27: smin tshugs ring dang 'jam pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-28: snum dang spu ni mnyam pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-29: phyag ring rgyas dang snyan mnyam dang //
T03D3793:136a-30: nyams pa rnam par spangs pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-31: dpral ba legs par 'byes pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-32: dbyes che ba dang dbu rgyas dang //
T03D3793:136a-33: dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag dang //
T03D3793:136a-35: mi bshor dri zhim skyes bu yi //
T03D3793:136a-36: yid ni 'phrog par byed pa dang //
T03D3793:136a-37: dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis ni //
T03D3793:136a-38: sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang por bzhed //
T03D3793:136a-40: 'du byed thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral ba
T03D3793:136a-41: nyid kyis sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu nyid
T03D3793:136a-42: dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i lhag
T03D3793:136a-43: pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis sen mo mdog snum pa
T03D3793:136a-44: dang / nyid dang / rigs kyi mchog las skyes pas sen mo mtho ba nyid dang /
T03D3793:136a-45: tshul kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid kyis sor mo rnams zlum pa nyid dang /

T03D3793:139b-22: rab kyi gnas skabs yin no //

T03D3793:139b-24: phyir so so ba dang mtha' dag tu rnam par
T03D3793:139b-25: bsgoms pa'i don gzhung srong bar byed pas mthar gyis
T03D3793:139b-26: pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3793:139b-27: nyid gsum gyi go rims kyi gnas skabs yin no
T03D3793:139b-28: // de nas khyad par du 'gror med pas yang
T03D3793:139b-29: dag par skad cig ma gcig pa'i mngon par rdzogs
T03D3793:139b-31: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs yin no //
T03D3793:139b-32: de nas de'i 'bras bu yin pas chos kyi sku
T03D3793:139b-33: mdzad pa dang bcas pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3793:139b-34: nyid gsum gyi rnam par smin pa yin no //
T03D3793:139b-35: de ltar na yum thams cad kyi don bsdus pa gzhan rnam pa drug ste /
T03D3793:139b-36: snga ma kho na bzhin du bshad par bya ba yin no //
T03D3793:139b-37: bar ma la dga' ba'i sems can la phan gdags
T03D3793:139b-38: par de ltar don bsdus pa drug gi sgo nas
T03D3793:139b-40: yang mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i sems can la phan gdags par gzhan du rnam par bshad pa /
T03D3793:139b-41: yul ni rnam pa gsum po rgyu //
T03D3793:139b-42: sbyor ba bzhi yi bdag nyid dang //
T03D3793:139b-43: chos sku phrin las 'bras bu ni //
T03D3793:139b-44: don bsdus gzhan te rnam pa gsum //
T03D3793:140a-0: dang por rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @140a * //
T03D3793:140a-1: pa nyid la sogs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3793:140a-2: gsum gyi ngo bo nyid ni 'jug pa'i yul gyi
T03D3793:140a-3: rgyu yin no // de ji ltar rab tu sbyor zhe na /
T03D3793:140a-4: de'i 'og tu rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs
T03D3793:140a-5: par rtogs pa la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa
T03D3793:140a-6: rnam pa bzhi ni sbyor ba yin no //
T03D3793:140a-7: sbyor ba de lta bu dang ldan pa'i rgyu de'i 'bras bu ci zhig yin zhe na /
T03D3793:140a-8: de'i 'og tu chos kyi sku phrin las bcas pa ni 'bras bu yin pas /
T03D3793:140a-9: rgyal ba'i yum rnam pa gsum gyi don bsdus pa gzhan rnam pa gsum ste /
T03D3793:140a-10: de kho na bzhin du bshad par bya ba yin no //
T03D3793:140a-11: la la las don gzhan las tshig / gzhan las rnam grangs ming gis te //
T03D3793:140a-12: mkhas pa rnams kyis yum kun la'ang //
T03D3793:140a-13: don bsdus de tsam shes par bya //
T03D3793:140a-14: de lta min na thams cad kyi //
T03D3793:140a-15: rim pa legs par bsdus ma yin //
T03D3793:140a-16: de la bsdus sogs rab dbye bas //
T03D3793:140a-17: khyad par yod pa kho nar zad //
T03D3793:140a-18: 'phags pa rnam par grol sde yi //
T03D3793:140a-19: mthu yis don mtheng sgo nas ni //
T03D3793:140a-20: go bar sla phyir tshig dang ni //
T03D3793:140a-21: ngag sogs sbyor ba ma byas par //
T03D3793:140a-22: mkhan po yang dag rnam snang mdzad //
T03D3793:140a-23: bla ma bzang la phyag 'tshal nas //
T03D3793:140a-24: tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel gsal ba //
T03D3793:140a-25: 'di ni seng ge bzang pos byas //
T03D3793:140a-26: de bsdebs pa las byung ba yi //
T03D3793:140a-27: dge ba bdag gis gang thob pa //
T03D3793:140a-28: de yis skye bo thams cad ni //
T03D3793:140a-29: bde gshegs shes rab thob par shog / shes rab mi gsal bstan bcos kun //
T03D3793:140a-30: phyi rol gyur bdag gang na zhig /'phags blo'i spyod yul bdag nyid che //
T03D3793:140a-31: bstan bcos don ni gang na yin //
T03D3793:140a-32: 'on kyang spyod yul ma yin la //
T03D3793:140a-33: rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi ngor //
T03D3793:140a-34: bdag gis 'bad bgyis nongs pa la //
T03D3793:140a-35: skye bo mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod //
T03D3793:140a-36: kye ma gzhung lugs sna tshogs kyis //
T03D3793:140a-37: dub pa bdag gis ngal gso'i gnas //
T03D3793:140a-38: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i lugs //
T03D3793:140a-39: ring mo zhig nas mthong ba yin //
T03D3793:140a-40: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag
T03D3793:140a-41: gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya
T03D3793:140a-42: ba'i 'grel pa / slob dpon seng ge bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T03D3793:140a-44: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra pra bh'a dang /
T03D3793:140a-45: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba ban de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
T03D3793:140a-46: slad kyis pandi ta dpal go mi 'chi med la sogs pa dang /
